name: The Last Room (LozzaDawg)
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 37. This is my second Ludum Dare, but my first one (LD 36) was made with game maker, where this game uses Javasript. It was a pretty big step and I'm still no master at managing my time, so its kina.... unfinished and overall pretty bad, but its there. I do plan to continue working on it, and making it a full game.

-LozzaDawg
